name: Battel for Middle Earth 2
description: Installer for BFME2 patch v1.06 needed for BFME2 RotWK.
notes:
Does not install game.dat (not sure how check-boxes work). 
You would need to replace the game.dat file.

files.bfme2_patch_1_06: Please select installer for patch 1.06 for "The Battle for Middle-Ear".

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/The Battle for Middle-earth (tm) II/lotrbfme2.exe

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Run game installer (Select "Quit" after installation has finished)

content:
files:
- bfme2_patch_1_06: Please select installer for patch 1.06 for "The Battle for Middle-Ear".
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/The Battle for Middle-earth (tm)
    II/lotrbfme2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Create 32-bit Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disk:
    requires: AutoRun.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Run game installer (Select "Quit" after installation has finished)
    executable: $DISC/AutoRun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Install patch 1.06
    executable: bfme2_patch_1_06
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
